heading: HR00745
0: A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE RECENT ATTACKS MADE BY THE NPA WHILE A MUTUALLY DECLARED UNILATERAL CEASEFIRE IS IN PLACE AND TO URGE BOTH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE COMMUNIST PARTY OF THE PHILIPPINES-NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY-NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT (CPP-NPA-NDF) TO CONTINUE WITH THE PEACE TALKS IN ORDER TO PRESERVE THE GAINS OF THE PEACE PROCESS AND TO REMOVE THE HINDRANCES IN ATTAINING A JUST AND LASTING PEACE IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY since 2017-02-08
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00745
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE RECENT ATTACKS MADE BY THE NPA WHILE A MUTUALLY DECLARED UNILATERAL CEASEFIRE IS IN PLACE AND TO URGE BOTH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE COMMUNIST PARTY OF THE PHILIPPINES-NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY-NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT (CPP-NPA-NDF) TO CONTINUE WITH THE PEACE TALKS IN ORDER TO PRESERVE THE GAINS OF THE PEACE PROCESS AND TO REMOVE THE HINDRANCES IN ATTAINING A JUST AND LASTING PEACE IN THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY ON 2017-02-08
